name: 2. Add a new task by using the box above
3. Create a new list by using the box in the sidebar
4. You can see all your tasks and completed tasks by clicking on the list in the sidebar
5. Click on a task to expand it
notes: You can add notes, due dates and change the priority.

name: 6. Sort, delete and print lists from the dropdown menu next to the list name.
7. Rename lists at the top of the screen.
8. Thanks for checking out Nitro! We hope you enjoy using it.
